title: Why do we have to lock in a champion in Blood Moon gamemode, I now have a 15 min ban from this

replies.body: i got sh*t on by my friends for not locking in cuz u dont have to for normals. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Cause riot is a bunch of bonobos who rarely thinks about details like these before launching something new. They'll probably change it next time or one day in the future, but for now we have to live with their stupidity.
That is just stupid.....They never mention this nor in their page for Blood Moon. And it is Blind pick why need to lock in...
